app.ganchyas.NonActivityClasses

Class ConversationPack

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.ganchyas.NonActivityClasses.ConversationPack

  • public class ConversationPack
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for a single Conversation Data (not messages, only meta data)
    Author:
    Paradox
